      • iterate

        public static net.ericaro.neoitertools.Generator<java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>>> iterate(INDArrayIndex... indexes)
        Iterate over a cross product of the coordinates
        Parameters:
        indexes - the coordinates to iterate over. Each element of the array should be of type SpecifiedIndex otherwise it will end up throwing an exception
        Returns:
        the generator for iterating over all the combinations of the specified indexes.
